Syn þa ealdras swylce gecorene, þæt se abbod his bryðenna on hy todælan mæge; ne syn hy gecorene be nanre endebyrdnesse, ac be lifes geearnunge and wisdomes lare.

Gif heora hwylc þurh þæne truwan his ealdorscipes færinga toðint and hine on modignesse onhefð, and he on þam leahtre bið onfunden, sy him æne gestyred and eft and þriddan siðe; gif he þonne swa ne bete and rihtlæce, he sy of ðam ealdorscype aworpen, and oþer sy ongeset, ðe þæs wyrðe is.
And þæt sylfe we settað and tæcað be þam prafoste.
BE MUNECA RESTE.
Ænlypige munecas geond ænlypige bed restan.
Hy bedreaf onfon æfter heora drohtnunge gemete and æfter heora abbodes dyhte.
Gif hit beon mæge, hy ealle on anum huse restan; gif seo menigo to þam micel sy, þæt hy ne mægen, tynum and twentigum on anum inne ætgædere restan mid heora ealdrum, þe embe hy carien.
Leoht on ðæm selfum inne singallice ofer ealle niht byrne oð leohtne mergen.

Hy gewædode and begyrde resten and nane sex be heora sidan næbben, þe læs þe hy on slæpe gewundade weorþan, ac þæt hy symle gearowe syn, and geworhtum beacne hy butan elcunge arisende caflice gehwylc oþerne forestæppe and to ðam Godes weorce efste þæt þonne sy mid mycelre gestæþðignesse and gemetfæstnesse.
Seo geogoð na getanglice ne licge, ac sio yld þa geogoðe to licge.
To þam Godes weorce arisende, heora ælc oþerne myngige, þæt þa slapule nane lade næbben.
BE GYLTA BOTE.

Gyf hwylc broðor ongyten bið toþunden, oþþe ungehyrsum, oþþe modig, oðþe ceoriende, oþþe on ænigum þinge wiðerweard wuniende þam halgum regule, and his yldrena geboda oferhogiend, þes þyllica æfter Godes gebode sy dyhlice mid wordum tuwa oðþe þriwa gemyngod.
Gif he swa ne bete and hine sylfne ne gerihte, he sy geþread openlice beforan eallum.
Gif he þonne swa gyt hine selfne ne geriht, gif he ongyt hu hefigtyme wite hit is, he amænsumenge underhnige; gif he þonne gyt wiðerræde bið, he lichamlice wrace mid swingelle þolige.
HWYLC GEMET ON ÐÆRE BOTE TO HEALDENNE SY.
Æfter þæs gyltes gemete sceal beon gelengen þære amansumunge gemet oðþe þære steore; stande þara gylta gemetgung on þæs abbodes dome.
Þeahhwæþere gif hwylc broðor on lytlum gyltum byð onfunden, sy he ascyred fram beodes gemænnesse.

Ðis is mid gesceade to healdenne þæm þe ascyrede syn fram þam gemænan gereorde, ðæt is þæt hy an cyricean ne beginnen naðer ne sealm ne antefene, ne rædinge ne ræden oþ fulre dædbote; his gereordes þigene he ana underfo æfter gebroðra gereorde.
Swylc ic þus cweþe: gif þa gebroþru on middæg gereorden, gereorde he on non; gif hy on non, he on æfen, oþ þæt he o mid þæslicre dædbote forgifenesse æt Gode begyte.
BE HEFIGTYMUM GYLTUM.
Se broðor, se þe mid swærra gylta hæfene bið gedered and on hefigtymum gyltum bið arasod, sy he ascyred fram gemænre mysan þigene and eac swa fram þam ingange þære halgan cyrican.

Nan broðor him nane geþeodrædene to næbbe, ne on spræce ne on nanum oþrum gemanan; sy he ana wuniende on betæhtre note mid dædbote and hefefulre hreowesunge, understande eac þone egefullan cwide, þe se apostol be swa forgyltum cwyþ: Si þus gerad man sceoccan betæht to flæsces forwyrde, toþy þæt se gast on Godes dome gehealden sy.
His metes gereord he ana underfo, þam gemete and on þære tide, þe se abbod understande, þe him gebyrige.
Ne he ne sy gebletsod fram nanum þara, þe hine met, ne se mete þe ma, þe him geseald bið.
BE ÐAM ÐE BUTAN HESE ÐÆS ABBODES WIÐ ÐA DÆDBETENDAN ÐEODAÐ.

Gif hwylc broðor butan his abbodes hæse gedyrstlæcð, þæt he on ænige wisan ænige geþeodrædene nime wið þone amansumedan, oðþe þurh ænige spræce oðþe þurh æniges oþres mannes ærendunge, sy he gelicum gelimpe amansumad, and on gelicre wrace dædbete.
HU ABBOD CAREFUL BEON SCEAL YMBE ÐA DÆDBETENDAN.
Se abbod mid ealre emhydignesse carige embe þa gyltendan gebroðru, forðy þa halan læces ne lacnunge ne behofiað, ac þa untruman.

Forðy on eallum gemete hy scylun læca þeawe on heora heordræddenne notian; he sceal oft dyhlice ealde witan and gestæþþige sendan, þæt þone unstaðolfæstan broðor and þone tweonigendan to dædbote and to his agenre þearfe manigean and hine swa frefrigean, þæt he þurh mycele gnornunge ne sy on lyre forswolgen.
Sy on þone synnigan broðor seo soðe lufu acyd and gefæstnod, and ealle gebroðru for hine gebiddan.
Þearle swyþe se abbod sceal gyman and mid eallan gleawscipe hogian, þæt nan sceap of þære heorde ne losige, þe him betæht is.

Wite he, þæt he þa gymenne þara untrumra saula to rihtre lacnunge underfeng and na for ricetere, þe he ofer ða hæbbe, þe hale syndon; he eac ondræde þa þeowwrace, þe drihten þurh his witigan ðywð, þus cweþende: þæt ge fættas gesawan, þæt ge gecuran, and þæt wanhal wæs and alewed, þæt ge awurpan.

Ac se abbod geefenlæce þa bysene þæs arfæstan and þæs mildheortan hyrdes, þe uppan þære dune forlet niganandhundnigantig sceapa, and an, þe ðær losode and dwelede, geornlice sohte and funde, and þæs sceapes untrumnesse him to ðam swiðe ofhreaw, þæt he hit ofer his eaxla lede and eft up to þære heorde bær.
BE ÐAM ÐE OFT GEÐREAD BEOÐ AND NA ÐE BETERAN NE BEOÐ.

Gif hwylc broðor oft rædlice geþread for hwylcum gylte bið, ne he furðon for amansunge gebetan nelle, ne his þeawas gerihtlæcan, hine man þreage mid teartran steore, þæt is him sige on swingella wracu.
Gif he þænne þurh ða swingella ne bið geriht, ac on modignesse wuniende mid upahefednesse his yfelan dæda mid leasum talum bewarian wile, do þænne se abbod swa swa wis læce.

Gif he sweðunga gegearwode and godcundra myngunga sealfunga, haligra gewrita lacnunga, and æt nyhstan amansumunge bærnet and swingella wita þurhteah and ongyt, þæt eal his hogu and gleawscipe naht framað, he þonne gegearwige, þæt þæt mæst is, his agen gebed and ealra broðra for hine, þæt drihten, þe ealle þing mæg and ealra þinga wylt, gehæle þone untruman and þone leahterfullan broðor.

Gif he furðon þurh þa gebedu gehæled ne bið, notige þonne se abbod cyrfes, and mid isene þa uncoðe aceorfe and fram þære hæle ascyrige, þurh ðæs apostoles mungunge, þe ðus cwæþ: Afyrrað þone yfelan fram eow; and eft he cwyð: Gif se getreowleasa gewite, he gewite, þylæs þe an adlig sceap ealle heorde besmite.
BE ÐAM ÐE UTFARAÐ HWÆÐER HI MON EFT UNDERFON SCYLE.

Se broðor, þe for his agenum lehtre oðþe unðeawe of mynstre færð oðþe adræfed bið, gif he eft gecyrran wile, behate ærest bote and geswicenesse ealra þæra unþeawa, þe he fore adræfed wæs, and he sy onfangen on uteweardre endebyrdnesse, þæt he þurh þæt sy afandod, hwæþer he mid eadmodnesse gecyrre.

Gif he þænne eft for his unðeawum utfærð, oþþe adræfed bið, he þeah sy onfangen oð þan þriddan siðe; wite he þonne, ofer ðæt þæt him ælces infæres forwyrned bið and he næfre eft to þam mynstre gecyrran ne þearf.
BE GEONGRA MANNA STEORE.

Ælc yld and andgit scylun habban on steore agene gemetu; forðy þonne geonge cild and stiðe cnapan oðþe þa, ðe hwonlice understandan magan, hu micel wite is and hu hefigtyme, þæt man on amansumunge sie, þa ðyllice, þonne hy agyltað, him man styre oðþe mid swiðlicum fæstenum, oðþe mid teartum swingellum hy wylde, þæt hy gehælede syn.
BE MYNSTRES HORDERE
Se mynstres hordere si gecoren of þære gesamnunge, wis, on geripedum þeawum, syfre and na oferettol, na drefend, ne teonful, ne lofgeorn, ac God ondrædende; sy he ealre geferrædenne swa swa fæder.
He hogige embe ealle ðing; ne do he nan ðing butan þæs abbodes hæse; healde þæt him beboden sy.
He his gebroðru ne geunrotsige; gif hwylc broðor unsceadelice hwæs bidde, he þeah mid forseawennesse hine ne geunrotsige, ac gesceadwislice mid eaðmodnesse his yfelan bene forwyrne.
Gehealde he a his geþanc, þæt he mid godan mode þenige, and sy gemyndig þæs, þe se apostol þus cwyð: Se þe wel þenað, he godne wyrðscipe him sylfum gestrynð.
Hæbbe he care and gymene untrumra manna mid ealre emhydignesse and eac swa cildra and cumena and þearuena, wite he butan tweon, þæt he æt Godes dome be heom eallum gescead agyldan sceal.

Ealle mynstres fata and spede he sceal beseon, swylce þa gehalgedan fata þæs weouedes; ne læte he nan þing to gymeleste; ne he uncysta na begange, na he lofgeorn ne sy, and he na mynstres æhta ne yte, ne na myrre, ac ealle þing gemetlice do and æfter his abbodes hæse.
Hæbbe he eaðmodnesse toforan eallum þingum, ðæm þe he of mynstres æhta næbbe to syllanne, sylle gode andsware, forðy hit is awriten, þæt seo gode antswaru sy ouer ða selestan selene.
Hæbbe he under his gymene eal, þæt se abbod him betæce; and he furðor ne gedyrstlæce to donne, þonne him beboden sy.

Þa gesettan bileouene his gebroðrum gebeode on rihtne timan buton late and gnornunge, þæt hy ne geunrotsigen, sy gemyndig þære godcundan clypunge, hwæt se geearnige, þe geæbylið enne þara læstena, þe on God behycgað.
Gif seo geferræden swa micel sy, sy him frouer and fultum geseald, he mid heora fultume efnum mode and gladum þa ðenunga, þe him befæste syn, lustbære gefylle.
On gedafenum tidum syn gesealde þa þincg, þe to syllenne synt, and syn gebedene, þe to biddene synt, þæt nænig sy gedreued, ne geunrotsige on Godes huse.
BE MYNSTRES TOLUM AND GEHWYLCUM ÆHTUM.

Mynstres æhta on tolum oðþe on reafum oðþe on oðrum gehwylcum þingum syn betæhte to bewitenne þam gebroþrum, þe heora lif and þeawas gode gecorene syn and þam abbode orsorge, and he þa betæce þæm, þe heora notian sceolan and heora eft underfon.
Hæbbe se abbod a mid him gewrit ealra þæra æhta; þonne seo notu on gebroðra gewrixle bið, sy þæt gewis a mid þam abbode, þæt he wite, hwæt betæht sy and hwæt underfangen.
Gif heora hwylc fullice oðþe gymeleaslice mynstres þing behwyrfe, sy him gestyred; gif he betan nele, underlicgge he rihtlicre þreale.
Be ðam ðæt munecas syndrige æhte næbben.

Healicast and swidost mon scel þone unþeaw of mynstre wanian and mid ealle awyrtwalian, þæt nænig ne gedyrstlæce, ænig ðing to syllenne oðþe to nimine, butan þæs abbodes hæse, ne he nan ðing syndries ne age, ne nan þing eallunga, ne furðon boc, ne weaxbreda, ne græf, ne on eallum þingum nan ðing.
Eornestlice, hwæt scel he agan on sundrum, þe furðon his agenne lichoman ne his agen mod ne sceal agan on his agenum gewealde?
Ealra neadþinga he sceal hihtan and wilnigan fram his mynstres fæder.
Ne he nan þing næbbe butan þæs abbodes sylene and geþauunge; syn heom ealle þing gemæne, swa swa hit awriten is on þara apostola drohtnunge, be þam muneca lif is gebysenod.
Ne nan ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he ænig þing syndries hæbbe oðþe furðon þæt word gecweþe, þæt he agen hæbbe.
Gif hwa on þysan manfullan and forcuðestan unðeawe ænigne lust hæbbe, oðþe þurh myngunge his ealdrena geswice, oðþe hine man mid swyðlicum and lichwamlicum þrealum gewylde.
BE ÐÆM ÐÆT MAN EALLUM MUNECUM GELICE DON NE SCYLE.
Syn gehwam behefe þing and alefede gesealde, be þam þe hit on ðara apostola drohtnunge awriten is þisum wordum: ælcan ænlypium wæs geseald be ðam, þe he behofade.

Ne ongyte we on þisse clypunge, þæt þær ænigra hada andfencg wære, þæt is þæt ænig be liues ricetere, ac ælc be his neode and untrumnesse ancnawen wære; se þe on geferrædenne be lytlum and be eaðum þingum beon mæge, þancige he þæs Gode, and he ne geunrotsige, þeah man mare do oþrum, þe furðor behofað.

Se þe be maran þingan beon scyle for hwylcere lichomlicre tyddernesse, geeaðmede hine for his untrumnesse and hine na ne anhebbe on ðæt, swylce hit for geearnungum oþþe geþincðum gedon sy, þæt mon for mildheortnesse dyde: and swa ealle þa lima beoð on sibbe.

Toforan eallum þingum we myngiað, þæt næfre nanre ceorunge yfelnes for ænigum þinge on ahwylcum worde oðþe getacnunge geswutelod wurðe; gif hwa on ðam unðeawe anfunden sy, hine man mid stiðum þrealum gewylde.
BE WICÐENUM.

Gebroðru gemænelice heom betwyh þenien, and nænig sy beladod fram þære kycenan þenunge, buton hwa mid untrumnesse oðþe mid bysegum ofset sy, þæt he hit don ne mæge; þurh þa gemænan þenunge þysse hyrsumnesse byð seo mæste lufu Godes and manna gestryned.

Sy fultum geseald þam wacmodum and þam unstrangum, þæt hi mid unrotnesse þa hyrsumnesse ne don, ac habban ealle fultum and frouer be þære geferædene mycelnesse and be þære stowe staðole and getæsnesse.
Gif seo geferræden micel bið, sy se hordere aspeled æt þære þenunge and eac swa þa, þe mid miclum bysegum ofsette syn; elles þa oþre ealle heom gemænelice betwyh on þisse þenunge þeowian.

Ðære kycenan wicþenas on ðone sætresðæg ægðer ge fata þwean, ge wæterclaðas wacsan, þe hy heora handa and fet mid wipedan; þwean on þan sylfan dæge ealra gebroðra fet, ægðer ge þære wucan wicþenas, ge þære toweardan.
Heora þeningfata clæne and hale þam hordere betæcen; se hordere eft þære toweardan wucan wicþenum þa ylcan þeningfata betæce, and wite ægðer ge hwæt he underfo ge hwæt he betæce.

Ða wicþenas anre tide ær gemænum gereorde gan to hlafe and sume ænlypige siþe drincan, and þæt sy toforan gesetre bigleouene, þæt hy þe glædlicor butan gedeorfe and miclum geswince heora gebroðrum on ætes timan þenien; ðehhweþere freolstidum beon butan þam hlafgange and drynce, oðþæt hi mæssan hæbben.
Sunnandagum þa wicþenas, ge þære ærran wucan ge þære toweardan, sona æfter dægredsange innan cyrican betyrnan hy wið ealra geferena cneowa, swa biddende, þæt heom foregebeden sy.

Se þe þa ærran wicþenunga geendod hæbbe, þonne he ut of þære wicþenunge fære, cweþe þis fers þus þanciende: Gebledsod þu eart, drihten ælmihtig, þe me on þysse ðenunge gefultumadest and gefrefrodest; and þis fers sy þriwa gecweden, and swa mid bledsunge of þære wicþenunge fare.

Æfterfylige þære toweardan wucan wicþen and þus cweþe: Begim þu, God, me to fylste, efst þu, drihten, me to fultume; and þæt sylue fers sy geedlæht þriwa fram ealre geferrædenne, and swa mid bletsunge his wicþenunge beginne.
BE UNTRUMUM GEBROÐRUM.

Untrumra manna gymen is to healdenne toforan eallum þingum, þæt heom swa geþenod sy, swa swa man Gode sylfan wolde, forðy þe he sylf cwæþ: Untrum ic wæs, and ge geneosedan me, and: þæt ge anum þam læstan, þe mine synd, dydon, þæt ge dydon me.
Witen eac þa sylfan untruman, þæt heom for Godes arwyrðnesse gehyrsumod and geþenod sy, and hy mid heora ouerflowednesse ne gedrefen þa gebroðru, þe heom þeniað.
Sy eornostlice seo mæste hogu þæm abbode, þæt hy forgymeleasede ne syn.
Sy þam untrumum gebroðrum synderlice cyte geset and to þam anum betæht; se þen, þe heom þenað, sy careful, God luuiende and ondrædende.
Bæþ þam untrumum, swa oft swa hit framige, sy gebodum; halum and huru þam geongum sy seldor and lator getiðod.
Flæscæt þam untrumum and þam wanhalum for geedstaþelunge sy geðafod; sona swa hy geedwyrpte beoð and gestrangode, þam flæscæte forhæbben æfter gewunelicum þeawe.
Hæbbe se abbod mycele gymene, þæt þa untruman fram þam horderum and þam þeningmannum ne syn forgymeleasede, forðy eal he mot astundian, swa hwæt swa fram his gingrum forgymeleasod bið.
BE EALDUM MUNECUM AND CILDGEONGUM.
Þeah hit gecyndelic sy on menniscum gewunan, þæt man mildheortnesse cyðe þam oferealdum and þam cildgeongum, þeahhweþere ne scylen hy beon butan regole, þæt is lifes rihtinge.
Sy simle gesceawod on hy heora untrumnys and natoðæshwon regoles stræc gehealden on heora bileouan; and sy mildheortnes on hy acyþed, and mid heora þygene forhradian þa regolican tida.
BE ÐÆRE WUCAN RÆDERE.
Gebroðra gereorde æt hyra mysum ne sceal beon butan haligre rædinge.
Ne nan ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he færlice boc gelæcce and þær butan foresceawunge onginne to rædenne; ac þære wucan rædere on ðone sunnandæg mid bletsunge hit beginne.

Se þonne æfter mæssan and huslgonge wilnige, þæt him fram eallum foregebeden sy, þæt God ælmihtig upahefednesse gast fram him ado, and sy þis fers him beginnendum þriwa gecweden fram eallum: Drihten, geopena þu mine welleras, and min muð bodige þin lof; and þus mid bletsunge beginne þære rædinge þenunge.
Sy þænne healic swige æt þæm gereorde, þæt nanes mannes stefn oðþe reonung þærinne gehyred ne sy, butan þæs ræderes anes.
Gif hy etende oðþe drincende hwylcera þinga behofien, þæt sy mid sumere getacnunge gebeden and na mid menniscre stefne.

Ne furþon hyra nan ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he be þære sylfan rædinge þærinne ænig ðing ahsige, oðþe be ænigum oðþrum þingum, þelæs þe ænig incca geseald sy, butan hit þæt sy, þæt se ealder hwæt scortlice of þære rædinge to hyra gastlican getimbrunge gereccan wille.
Ðære wucan rædere gange to hlaue and drince, ærðam þe he beginne to rædenne, for ðæs halgan husles þigene and þæt him to langsum his fæsten ne þince; ete him eft æfter his rædinge mid þeningmannum.
Ne ræden gebroðru, ne ne singen be nanre endebyrdnesse, ac ða syn gecorene to ðære note, þe hit don cunnon and oþre getimbrien mægen.
BE ÆTES GEMETE.
We gelyfað, þæt genoh sy to dæghwamlicum gereorde twa gesodene sufel for missenlicra manna untrumnesse; gif hwa for hwylcre cisnesse þæs anes brucan ne mæge, bruce huru þæs oðres.
Gif mon æppla hæbbe oðþe hwylces oþres cynnes eorðwæstmas, sy þæt to þriddum sufle.
Sy anes pundes gewihte hlaf to eallum dæge.
Gif hy on twa mæl etað, sy gehealden þæs pundmætan hlafes se þridda dæl to þam æfengifle.

Gif hi mid weorces geswince to ðam swiðe ofsette beoð, þæt hi hwilces eacan behofien, stande se eaca on ðæs abbodes dome, þæt þonne swa sy foresceawod, swa þær næfre oferfyl ne filige, forþi nis cristenum monnum nan ðing swa wiðerweardlic and hefigtyme swa swa oferfyl, be ðam se hælend sylf þus clypað: Warniað, þæt eowere heortan ne syn ofersymede mid oferfylle.
Geongum cnapum ne sy bileofa geseald be ðam ilicum gemete, ac læsse þonne þæm mærum, þæt forhæfednes ægðer ge on ylde ge on geogoðe simble gehealden sy.
Ealle endemes fram flæscæte eallum gemete hi forhæbben, butan þam wanhalum anum and þam legerfæstum.
BE DRINCES GEMETE.

Anra gehwylc hæfð syndrige gyfe fram Gode, sume furðor þonne sume; and forðy þænne ic mid tweoningum oðrum monnum bileofan gesette; we þeah manna untrumnesse and tydernesse besceawiende gelyfað, þæt genoh sy ænlypigum munuce to dæges drence, þæs wines gemet, þe is emina gehaten.
Witan þeah þa, þe mid geðylde fram wine forhabbað, þæt hy æt Gode mycele and agene mede habbað.

Gif þonne þære stowe neod oþþe gedeorf oðþe sumerhæte hwylces eacan behofige, sy þæt on ðæs abbodes dome, and þone eacan swa forsceawige, swa hy næfre mid oferfylle undersmogene and beswicene ne weorðan.

We þeah rædað, þæt munecum eallunga to windrince naht ne belimpe, ac forðy þe þæt munecum on urum timan gelæred beon ne mæg, we þa geðafunga þæs drynces on þa wisan doð, þæt þær næfre seo fyl be fullum ne weorðe.
Ac sy a on þære þigene forhefednes, þæt he him læsse nime þænne hine lyste, forðy win gedeþ, þæt furðon witan oft misfoþ and fram rihtum geleafan bugan.

Ðær wana þurh þære stowe hæfenleaste sy, þæt man þæt fulle wines gemet habban ne mæge, ac mycele læsse, oðþe eallunga næne dæl, bletsien þa heora drihten, þe ðær wunian, and hy na forðy ne ceorien, ne mid mode ne besargien; toforan eallum þingum we ðæs mynegunge doð, þæt hy butan ceorunge syn.
BE GEREORDES TIDUM.
Fram þam halgan eastrum oð pentecosten eten gebroþru on twa mæl, þæt is ærest on ðære syxtan tide and eft on æfen.

Fram pentecosten ouer ealne sumar fæstan twegen dagas on þære wucan, þæt is on wodnesdæg and frigedæg, butan hy ouermicel geswinc habben, oðþe swiðlic hæte þæs sumeres derige; oþrum dagum etan on twa mæl, þæt is to middæges and eft on æuen.
Gif hy ut an æcere wurc habben, oðþe þæs sumeres welm to swiðlic bið, þæs middæges gereord is singallice to anlætenne, þæt þonne sy on ðæs abbodes foregesceawunge.
He ealle þing swa gemetegige and gefadige, þæt huru þa sawla gehealdene syn, and þæt þæt gebroðru wyrcen, wyrcan þæt butan ceorunge.
Fram idus septembris oð lenctenes anginne hy on an mæl to nones gereorden.
Ouer eallencten oþ eastran hy oð æfen fæsten.
And se æfen swa sy gefadod, þæt hy candelleohtes æt ðam gereorde ne behofien, ac eallu ðing be dæges leohte gefyllede syn.
On ælcne timan swa sy gefadod, swaþær hit sy, swa an mæl swa twa, þæt eallu þing be dæges leohte gefadode syn.
BE MUNECA SWIGAN ÆFTER NIHTSANGE.
On ælcne timan munecas swigan began scylan, þeah ealra swiðost on niht.

Sam hy fæsten, sam hy ne fæsten, gif hit þonne beo seo tid æfengereordes, arisen hy sona, swa hy heora mete hæbben, and sitten on anre stowe, and ræde him mon þa raca oðþe lif þæra heahfædera, oðþe sum þing, þe hy to Gode tyhte.
Ne ræde him mon nauðer ne Moyses boc, ne Regum, forðæm þæm unandgytfullum þæt gastlice angyt is earfoþe to understandende butan haligra manna trahtnunge.
Ræde hy mon þeah oþrum tidum on cirican, þonne hit togebyrige; gif hit þonne fæstendagas beon, þonne ymbe lytel þæs þe æfen gesungen sy, gangan hy eft and gehyran þa bufan cwedenan rædingæ.

Samnige ealgeferræden to þære rædincge, sy heom swylc hyrsumnes betæht, swylc him sy, hy þa forlæten and to ðære rædincge mid ofste cumen, and feower leafum oþþe fifum oðþe swa mycel, swa þæs dæges lyhtincg geþauige, of þære boce geræddum, ealle endemes heora nihtsang singan and ða gebedo þæs tidsanges anmode mid anbryrdnesse gefyllen.

Æfter þæm nihtsange ne sy nanum alyfed, þæt he ænig word cweþe, butan hit swa limpe, þæt hwylc cuma unmyndluncga cume and se abbod for ðære neode hwilcum heora hwæt gebeode; ðæt þonne sy dygellice mid micelre gemetfæstnesse and gestæþþignesse gedon.
Gif hwa þonne butan þisse neode ðises regoles swigan abrece, sy he gewitnod mid hetolre steore.
BE ÐAM ÐE TO LATE TO TIDSANGE AND TO BEODFERSE CUMAÐ.

Sona swa þæt beacn þæs belhrincges gehyred bið, þærrihte forlæte æghwylc swa hwæt swa he on handa hæfde, and mid ofste þone tidsang þære godcundan þenunge gesece, onette þeah mid gestæþignesse and no mid higeleaste, ne yrne he, þelæs he mid þæs rynes eðgunge hwylcne wleattan and sogeðan on his heortan ne astyrige.
Ne sy nan ðing geset toforam þam Godes weorce, ne nan ðing swa besorh, þæt he his tidsang fore forlæte.

Se þe to ðæs uhtsancges anginne ne cume, ær þæs feower and hundneogantigan sealmes gloria sy gesungen, þonne we eac forði on ðam sancge lencgað, ne stande he on chore on his stede and endebyrdnesse, ac stande he ealra ytemest, oðþe on ðam stede, þe se abbod swa gemeleasum monnum to stealle on sundrum betæht hæfð, swa þæt he sy gewend fram þam abbode and fram eallum his geferum, and geendedum tidsancge openlice hreousigende bete, ðæt is, astrecce hine æt þæs tidsanges ende and mid þære gesewenlican dædbote his gymeleaste eaðmodlice gebete.
We forði tæhton, þæt hy on uteweardan oðþe onsundrum standen, þæt hy for ðære sceame and for gewande þara, þe him onlociað, gebeterede syn and eft cafran to Godes þeowdome.
Witodlice, gif we him butan cirican for ðære gemeleaste betæhton, wen is, þæt sume oðþe sleaclice lagon and slepon, oðþe sittende mid idelre spellunge deofle to micelne forwyrdes intingan gesealden.
Ac he gange in, þæt him se tidsancg ealnuncge ne losige, and þæt he on ðæm anginne forgymeleasode, gefullige and forðon gebete.

On þæm dæglicum tidum, se ðe to ðam anginne þæs tidsanges ne cume, ær ðæm þe se gloria þæs forman sealmes sy gesungen, stande on uteweardan, ealswa we ær cwædon; ne he ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he hine þæm chore geþeode, oðþe on his endebyrdnesse stande, buton se abbod him geþafunge mid leafe sylle.
Sy þeah seo leaf on ða wisan, þæt þær seo foresæde bot fylige and hine mid þæm eaðmodlice scyldigne gesweotolige.
Se þe to his beodferse ne cume, ac for sumum hwilces unþeawes leahtre gemænlice mid gebroðerum his drihten, þe is ealra gereorda gifend, mid herincge ne ðancað, sy him tuwa mid wordum gestyred.

Gif he be þisse steore gebetan nele, ne sy him gemæne þigen mid gebroðrum geþafod, ac he ana gereorde, ascyred fram his gebroðrum, and be dæle æt and wæt gewanod sy, oðþæt he þæs gyltes gymeleaste gebete.
On þas ilican wisan þolige and þæt bete, þe æt þam ferse ne bið, þe man æfter gereorde cwið.
Ne gedyrstlæce nan, ne ær gesettere tide ne æfter, nan ðing to ðigenne, ne on æte ne on wæte.

Gif hwam fram his ealdore geboden sy to ðigene, and he hit mid gebelge forsace, ne sy him to gewilnedum mæle nanre oðere þigene getiðod, buton þæs ilican, þe he ær forsoc, oðþæt he mid þæslicre dædbote gebete.
BE ÐAM AMANSUMEDAN HU HI DÆDBETAN.

Ða þe for swærum and hefigtymum gylte fram cyricean and gemænre beodes þigene ascyrede synt, æt ælces tidsanges geenduncge licgan hy ætforan þære cyrican dyre and forhtige astrehte to ðara gebroðra fotum, þe ut of cyrican gangen, nan ðincg mid muþe clypiende.
And þæt swa lange don, oþ þæt þam abbode ðince, þæt hi fulbet hæbben.

Siðþan him æfter þære bote geboden byð, þæt he to þam abbode cume, gefealle ærest þæs abbodes fet and syðþan ealra þara gebroþra and eadmodlice bidde, þæt hy ealle him to Gode mid heora gebedrædene þingian.
Æfter þam, gif þam abbode swa þince, sy he onfangen on chore on swylcere endebyrdnesse, swylce þam abbode þince, swa þeh þæt he nane þenunga on cirican onsundrum ne beginne, ær eft se abbod beode.
Ac æt ælces tidsanges geendunge astrecce hine eallum limum on þam ylecan stede, þe he stande.
And forðon on þa wisan mid hreowsunge dædbete, oð hit þam abbode fulbet þince and hine geswican hate.
Ða þe for lytlum gylte fram gemænum gebroðra gereorde ascyrede beoð, þa on cirican þæslice dædbetan and þæt fuldon on þæs abbodes hæse, oð þæt he hine bletsige and secge, þæt hit fulbet sy.
BE ÐÆM ÐE ON CYRICEAN MISFON.

Gif hwylc broðor wægð and misfehð on boduncge sealma, oðþe ræpsa, oðþe antefena, oðþe rædincge, butan he þærrihte beforan eallum hine dædbetende geeaðmede, he stiðran and teartran steore underfo, eornostlice, þa he ær mid eaðmodnesse his gylt gehælan nolde.
Geonge men for swa geradum gylte swingelle þolian.
BE ÐAM ÐE ON LYTLUM ÞINGUM GYLTAÐ.

Se broðor, se þe giltig ameldod bið þam abbode and his gebroþrum þurh oðerne man and no þurh hine selfne, he maran and stiþran steore underfo, gif he aðor dyde, oðþe ofergimde, oðþe forgeat, oðþe tobræc ænig þing on þære hyrsumnesse, þe he onhyrsumode, aþer oðþe on kycenan, oþþe on hederne, oðþe on mynstres bæcerne, oþþe on wyrtune, oðþe on ænigum oðerum cræfte, þe he mid lichomlicum geswince onhyrsumode.
Sy him seo steor þe stiðre, þe he him sylf his gylt ameldian nolde.

Gif his saule gyltas oþerum monnum digle beoð and him sylfum cuðe, mid his andetnesse onwreoða his abbode, oþþe suman swa gastlicum breðer, þe halfæst sy and his saule wundela gehælan cunne and hi gewidmærsian nelle.
BE GETACNIENDLICUM TIDUM GODES WEORCES.

Sy þæs abbodes gymen, þæt mon ealle tida þæs godcundan þeowdomes on rihte timan and gedafenlican hrincge, oþþe he sylf ælce tid getacnige, oðþe swylcum carefullan breðer þa gymene betæce, þe ælce tid on þæslicum timan mid beacne geswytelige and nane tid þæs godcundan weorces ne forgymeleasige.
Sealmas and antefenas be endebyrdnesse æfter þam abbode beginnen, þa þe hit beboden bið.
Ne gedyrstlæce hyra ænig, þæt he aðor do, oðþe ræde, oðþe singe, butan he þa þenunge forðbringan mæge, swa þæt he þa getimbrige and no ne gedrefe þa, ðe hine gehyrað.
BE DÆGHWOMLICUM WEORCUM, AND HWILCUM TIDUM HI RÆDAN SCYLON.
A bið idelnes þære saule feond, forðy þænne sculan þa gebroðra hwiltidum beon abysegode mid heora handa geswince, hwiltidum mid godcundre rædinge.

We þænne forþy gelyfaþ, þæt mid þisse gefaduncge ægðres weorces tima mæge beon geendebyrd: fram eastron oþ kalendas octobris, sona swa hy fram primsange gangen, wyrcen locahwæt þonne þearf sy, oð hit sy forneah an tid ouer undern; æfter ðam rædan heora bec oð middæg.
Æfter middæge, siððan hy gereorde beoð, gan to hyra reste mid ealre stilnesse; gif hwam þonne leofre sy, þæt he ræde, þonne he reste, ræde swa, þæt he oþre mid gehlyde ne geunstille.
Sy se non geradod and sy gehringed, þonne seo eahteoðe tid bið healf agan; wyrcan syðþan, þæt neod sy, oð æfen.

Gif þonne swa micel þearf þære stowe beo, þæt hy sculan sylfe hyra andlyfene gaderian, and hy on þam abysegode beon, ne beon hy þeah geunrotsod, forþam þæt beoð þonne riht munecas, gif hy libbað be þam geswince heora agenra handa, swa swa ure fæderas and þa apostolas dydon.
Beo hit þeah eal mid gemete, þelæs þe þa wacmodan beon ormode.
Ðonne from kalendas octobris oð lenctenfæsten ræden hy heora bec, oð beo an tid to underne; wyrcen siðþan oð non locahwæt him mon tæce.
Siðþan hy þone forman cnyl to none gehyren, gangen hy ealle from hyra weorce and don hy gearuwe, þæt hy magon to cirican gan, þonne mon eft cnylle.
Ðonne eft æfter heora nongereorde rædan hy eft heora bec, oðþe hyra sealmas singen.
Þonne on lenctenfæsten ræden heora bec from ærmorgenne oð heane undern and wyrcen þæt, þæt þearf sy, oþ beo an tid ofer non.
Nime heora ælc on ðam fæstendagum sume boc of þære bibliothecan, and rædan þa; sylle hie him mon onforan lencten.

Beon gesette an oðþe twegen ealde witan, þe þæt mynster geondgangen and þæs gyman, þæt þær nan broðor ymbe idelnesse and unnette spræce beo and ne beo ymbe his rædinge, þa hwile þe þa oðre rædan; ne biþ he na him anum unnyt, ac eac þa oþre to ðæm tyht.

Gif þær þonne hwylc bið gemet þus donde, swa hit na ne weorðe, þonne styre him mon æne oðþe tua; gif he hit þonne ne gebete, beo he þære regolican steore underðeod, swa þeah, þæt þa oðre þy maran ege habban.
Ne nan broðor wið oþerne ne þeode, ne mid his þeodrædenne ne lette on unþæslicum timan.
Sunnandagum rædan þa gebroðra halige bec, butan hwylcum þenuncg betæht sy.
Gif þær þonne hwylc broðor beo gemet swa gymeles and swa asolcen, þæt he nelle, oðþe ne mæge halige bec smeagan oðþe rædan, tæce him man oþer weorc, þæt he ealles unnyt ne beo.

Ðam untrumum gebroðrum, oðþe þæm mearewum and þam unweorcheardum tæce heom mon sum weorc, þæt hy unnytte ne syn, ne hy mid nanum weorces ungemete oðþe stiðnesse ofsette syn, þæt hy mid þæm ungemete afligede ne syn; ðæm abbode is a to behealdenne heora wanhalnes.
BE LENCTENES GYMENE.

Ðeah munecas eallum tidum sceolon forhæfdnesse habban fæstenes and to feawa manna þæt lif swa stiðlice hylt, þeah ealra swiðost healdan hy forhæfednesse clænsunge on lenctenfæstenne, swa þæt hy þonne on ðæm halgum dagum fordiligen, þæt hy ær on oþrum tidum mid gemeleste forleton.
Ðæt ðænne bið rihtlice gefadod, gif hy fram eallum leahtrum and unþeawum hy sylfe forhabbað; beon hy forþy geornfulle on gastlicum rædincgum and on halgum gebedum and onbryrdnesse heora heortan.
Geycan hy on þysum dagum hwæthwega to heora þam gewunelican þeowdome.

Hæbben hy forhæfdnesse on heora mettum and drincum, þæt heora ælc heora agenes willes Gode sumne dæl bringe mid gefean þæs halgan gastes of þam bufan cwedenan gemete heora andlyfene, and began hy geornlice syndrige gebeda and forhæfdnesse healdan, ægðer ge on æte, ge on wæte, ge on slæpe, and hy georne bewerian, ge nu, ge on ælcne timan wið leohtbrædnesse idelra worda and unnyttra gebæra, þæt hy þara eastrona onbiden mid gefean þære gastlican gewilnunge.

And þæt hy godes þances of heora andlyfene sellen, don hy þæt be þæs abbodes leafe and geþafunge; forðæm swa hwæt swa hy butan his leafe doþ and his geþafunge, þæt biþ swiðor to gymeleste and to idlum gylpe to tellanne, þonne to ælmessan.
Ælc þæra þinga, þe hy don, don hy hit be þæs abbodes leafe.
BE ÐAM GEBROÐRUM ÐE FEOR FRAM CYRICEAN WYRCAÐ.

Ða gebroðra, þe feor synd on geswince and for þan fyrlene on þam gedafenlicum tidum hyra cyrican and hyra tidsangas gesecan ne magon, gif se abbod þæt ongyt, þæt hit swa sy, gefyllan hi hira tida þærrihte þær hy wyrcan, and mid godcundan ege heora cneowa eaðmodlice gebigan.

Don handswagelice þa, þa on færelde synd, and hi na forgyman þa gesettan tida, ac ælcne tidsang gefyllan, swa hy selest mægen; þa gewunelican wæge hyra þeowdomes ne for weorces bysegum, ne for færeldes hi nateshwon forgymelesian.
BE ÐAM GEBROÐRUM ÐE ON FARE SYNDON.
Ða gebroþra, þe for hwylcere neode utfarað and þy ilcum dæge to mynstre cuman mægen, ne dyrstlæcen hi þæt hy ahwær ut of mynstre etan, þeah hy hwa bidde, butan hit him from heora abbode geboden sy.
Gif hwa hit þonne butan his leafe gedyrstlæce, beo he on amansumunge.
BE MYNSTRES GEBEDHUSE.
Gebedhus sy to þan anum, þe hit gecweden is, þæt is, þæt þær nan þincg elles geworht ne sy oðþe gefadod, butan þam anum weorce, þe to Gode belimpð, þæt is gebedræden.
Æt endunge ælces tidsanges gan hy ut ealle mid þære mæstan swigan and sy God gearwyrðod þæt se broþor, þe hine synderlice to Gode gebiddan wile, ne sy gehremmed oðþe gelet mid æniges oþres onhrope.
Gif hwylc hyra eft onsundran diglice gebiddan wille, mid stilnesse anfealdlice he ingange and hine gebidde, na mid hluddre stefne, ac mid teara wope and mid his heortam and ealles geþances gymene.
Eornestlice, þa ðe þyllic weorc þærinne wyrcan nellað, ne sy him nan wunung þærinne geþafod æfter þæs tidsanges geendunge, þylæs þe þa geremmede synd, þe þa synderlican gebeda lufiað.
BE CUMENA ANDFENGE.

Ealle cuman þe to mynstre cumað, syn hy onfangenne, swylce hit Crist sylf sy, forþy þe he sylf þus cwæþ on ðam halgan godspelle: Ic wæs cuma, and ge onfengon min; sy him eallum þæslic and gedafenlic wyrðment gegearewod, þeah swiðost þam rihtgelyfedum urum gehusum and þam forwrecenum elþeodegum.
Forðy eornestlice, sona swa se cuma gecyd sy, gange him se ealder togeanes, oðþe þa gebroðra, mid ealre þenunge þære soðan lufe, and hy ærest hy samod gebidden and swa syn on soðre sibbe geferlæhte.
Ne sy sibbecos heom geboden, ærþam þe hi to Gode hi gebidden and bletsunge underfon, for missenlicum deofoles gebysmerungum.

On þære gemænan gretinge sy eal eaðmodnes geboden and gegearwod eallum cumum, þe to mynstre cumað, oðþe fram mynstre farað: anlute him eaðmodlice to mid þam heafde, oðþe ealne lichoman on eorðan astrecce, and Crist sy swa mid eaðmodnesse gebeden, þe simle on cuman onfangen bið.
Syn hi to cyrican gelædde to gebede, and siðþan hi underfangene beoð, sitte him æfter ðan se ealdor mid, oðþe se, þe he hate.
Sy beforan þam cuman geræd seo godcunde æ and lar, þæt he sy getrymed to Godes willan, æfter þam beo him gegearewod gehyðlice eal mennislic fremfulnes.
Abrece se ealdor his fæsten for cumena þingum, butan hit hwylc healic fæsten sy, þe man abrecan ne dyrre; þa gebroðra healdan þeahhweþere hyra fæsten æfter gewunan.

Geote se abbod wæter þam cumum to handum; þwean ealra cumena fet, ægþer ge se abbod ge eal seo geferræden; æfter þam þweale sy þis fers þus gecweden: We anfengun, drihten, þine mildheortnesse on þam midlene þines temples.

Sy þam abbode seo mæste hogu þæs andfenges þearfena and elþeodigra, forþan Crist us on hy swiðost bið onfangen; ðara ricra manna ege and hoga gemyngað, þæt him selfum weorðlice sy gegearwod and wyrðmynt genoh geboden, ac Godes ege ana myndgað, þæt mon þearfum and elþeodegum monnum geþensum sy.
Sy þæs abbodes cicene and þara cumena onsundrun, þæt þa gebroþru ne synd geunstilde, þonne cuman færlice on uncuðum tidum to mynstre cumað; seldhwænne oðþe næfre mynster butan cuman bið.
To geares fæce twegen gebroðra into cumena cicenan gan, and þa synd swylce, þe wel þenian cunnan and þa þenunge wel gefyllen.
Sy him gefultumod, gif hy þæs behofiaþ, þæt hy þurh þæs fultumes frouer butan ceorunge þenien; eft þonne hy læssan bysega habbað, faran to swylcan weorce and hyrsumnesse, swylce him beboden sy.

Ðeos foresceawung sy gehealden na on þisum anum, ac on eallum mynstres þenungum, þæt is, þænne hy behofiað, sy him gefultumad and frofor þurhtogen, and eft þænne hy bysega on hyra wicum nabban and emetige synd, hyrsumian on swylcum þingum, swylce him man beode.

Sy cumena hus swylcum breðer betæht to bewitenne, þe fulne Godes ege hæbbe and his saule geahnige; beon þær symble bed genihtsumlice ofersprædde, and þæt Godes hus, þæt is cumena hus, wislice fram witum sy gefadod.

Noteþæshwon hyra nan wið cuman hine geferlæce oðþe ænig spræce wið hine age, butan þam anum, þe hit beboden bið; gif hi hwylcne cuman gemeten, greten hine eaðmodlice on þa wisan, þe we ær cwædon, and hine bletsunge bidden and him swa forð gan, secgende, þæt him alyfed nis, wið cuman to sprecænne.
BE ÐAM ÐÆT NAN MUNUC ÆRENDGEWRITA NE NANE OÐRE LAC NE UNDERFO.
Ne si natoþoshwon munece alyfed, þæt he ænig gewrit oþþe sende, oðþe lac fram hyra magum, oþþe fram ænigum oþrum men, oðþe him betweonum underfon, oþþe sellen, butan þæs abbodes hæse.
Gif hwæt hyra hwylcum from magum asend byþ, ne gedyrstlæce he hit no to underfonne, ær hit þam abbode gecyþed sy.

Gif hit þonne se abbod underfon hate, stande on his dome, hwan hit man selle; and se broðor, þe swylc lac to asend wæs, for ðam ne geunrotsie, þelæs þe he deofle þurh þæt ænigne intingan sylle, and to micelne gefean on his unrotnesse hæbbe.
Se þe oðerlicor gedyrstlæce, underhnige þære regulican þreale.
BE MYNSTERMONNA HRÆGELHUSE AND BE HYRA HRÆGELTALE.
Sy gebroðrum reaf geseald be swilcnesse and staþele þære stowe, þe hy onwuniað, and be þæs eardes oðþe þære lyfte gewiderum; on cealdum eardum neodað, þæt þæs reafes mare sy, on hleowfæstum læs.
Ðæs abbodes foresceawunge sceal beon be þysum, hu ðæs neodige.

We þeah gelyfað, on meodumum stowum þæt ænlipugum munecum genihtsumige, þæt he hæbbe cugelan and syric; sy on wintra seo cuhle of þiccum hrægle, heo sceal beon on sumera þinne oðþe eald awered; hæbban hy eac mid to wyrcenne scapulare, þæt is gehwæde cugelan and slyflease; hæbben hy to fotgewædum hosa and meon.
Ne ciden no þa munecas ymb þa deage oþþe greatnesse hyra reafa; hæbben swylce reaf, swylce mon findan mæge on þam earde, þe hy onwuniað, oþþe swylce mon undeorest bicgan mæge.
Besceawige se abbod and hate besidian þæra reafa gemet, þæt hy ne synd to scorte, ac gemæte þam, þe hyra notiað.
Agifen a þa ealdan, þonne him man niwe reaf sylle, and to hrægelhuse betæcen, þearfum to dælenne.

Genoh is munuce and fulgenihtsum, þæt he hæbbe twa cugelan and twegen syricas for þære nihtware and for þæs reafes þweale; idel and oferflowend byþ eal, þæt toforan þysum is; gif hit mare bið, hit sy gewanod.
Swa oft, swa hy aþor oðþe meon, oþþe ænig þing niwes underfon, betæce a þæt ealde.
Ða þa on ytinge ahwyder farað, niman him brec of hrægelhuse, eft swa hy ham cumen of þam færelde, betæcan him gewaxene.

Syn eac on hrægelhuse gehealden ægðer ge cugelan ge syricas hwæthwara beteran þonne þa, þe hy gewunelice weriað; and notian þara, þe for hwylcere neode on ytinge farað, and þa eft þam hrægelþene betæcen, swa hy ham cumen.
To bedreafe genihtsumige to hæbbenne meatte and hwitel and <bedfelt> and heafodbolster.
Ðeahhweþere se abbod sceal gelomlice sceawian þa bed and asmeagan for syndrigum æhtum.
Gif hi hwa hæbbe, oðþe on his bedde funden sy, þæt he from his abbode ne onfeng and þurh his sylen ne næfde, underlicge se þære hefigestan and þære stiþestan þreale.

Toþy þæt þes leahter syndrigere æhta mid ealle gewanod sy and adilegod, synd gesealde from þam abbode ealle neadbehefe þing, þæt is cugele, syric, meon, hosa, slyfa, gyrdel, seax, græf, nædl, sceat, weaxbreda, ðæt ælcere neode beladung sy adilegod, þæt hy þurh neode nane tale to syndrigre æhte næbben.

A sceal beon fram þam abbode geornlice besceawod and behealden se cwide, þe awriten is on þære boc, þe is gehatenActus Apostolorum, ðæt is, þæt æghwylcum wæs geseald, swa swa he behofode and neode hæfde.

Swa eac se abbod foresceawige þa untrumnessa þara, þe for neode and þearfe gehwylces þinges behofiað, and no on hyra neode wandige for ðan yflan willan æfestigra manna; beþænce he a Godes edlean on eallum his domum, þæt is, þæt him bið æt Godes dome geleanod, be þæm þe he ær worhte.
BE ABBODES BEODES GEREORDE.
Ðæs abbodes myse sceal a beon gemæne þearuum and elþeodegum mannum.
Þænne he to lyt cumena hæbbe, laðige him to swylce gebroðru, swylce he wille; stande on his dome, hwylce þa syn; læte þeahhweþere ænne oþþe twegen ealdras mid þam gebroþrum, þe heora þeawa begymen.
BE MYNSTRES CRÆFTIGUM.
Gif cræftige men on mynstre syn, began þane cræft and georne wyrcen, gif hit se abbod geþafað.

Gif hwylc hyra for ðæs cræftes þingon hine toþundenlice onhefð, for þæs cræftes truan and forðy, þe he bydæle þære stowe mid his cræfte framað, sy he ascyred from þam cræfte, and he natoþyshwon eft þone cræft ne beginne, butan he mid micelre eaðmodnesse þæs abbodes unnan begyte.
Gif man hwæt becypan scyle, þæs þe cræftige men on mynstre wyrcað, warnien þa, þe þone ceap drifað, þæt hi nan þing facenlices on þam ceape ne don.
Gemunen hi a Annaniam et Safiram, þylæs þe þone deað on hyra sawle þolien, þe hi licumlice þoledon, ælc þara þe on þisum oþþe on ænium oþerum mynstres þingum ænig þing facenlices deð.
Gif hwylc neod sy to becypenne ænig þing heora handcræftes, þæt sy butan gitsunge undeoror geseald, þonne hit woroldmannum gewunelic sy, þæt Godes lof on eallum þingum stande.
BE NIGCUMENRA GEBROÐRA ANDFENGE.

Gif hwa niwan to mynsteres drohtnunge gecyrran wille, ne sy him no eaþelice þæs infæres getiðod; ac do man ealswa se apostol tæcð, þæt is, þæt mon georne fandige, hwæþer hi mid Godes gaste afyllyde syn.

Gif he geþyldelice forbyrð ægðer ge hosp ge edwitu, and on þære wearne þurhwunað þeah and eadmodlice bit, þæt him mon infæres tiþige, sy he underfangen embe ane feower dagas oþþe fife and wunige on cumena huse ane feawa dagas.
Tæce him mon siððan to nigcumenra manna huse, and he þær ete and reste and embe his gastlican þearfe smeage.

And gastlic ealdor and wis his hæbbe gymene, þe wel saula Gode cunne gestrynan, se georne behogige and gesinlice gime, hwæþre he mid fulre anbryrdnesse and arweorðnesse God ælmihtigne gesece, and hweþer he carful sy and sceot to godcundum weorce and to hyrsumnesse, and hweþer he mid geþylde hopsas and edwitu þolian wille.
Syn him gebodod eal seo stiðnesse and seo earfoðnes, þe to Gode læt and to heofena rices gefean.

Gif he þonne behæt staðolfæste þurhwununge, embe twegen monðas sy þes regol geræd him ætforan, and sy him þus to gecweden: Her is seo æ, þe þu under hire tæcnige winnan wilt and campian; gif þe onhagige, þæt þu hit healdan mæge, far ðe in; gif þe ne onhagige, far ðe freoh, þider þu wille.
Gif he þonne git þurhwunað, sy he gelæd eft to nigecumenra monna huse, and his mon georne fandige, hwæþer he þolemod sy and geþyldig.
Eft embe syx monðas sy him geræd eal þes regol fram foreweardon, þæt he þe geornlicor understande, hwæt hit sy, þe he tofundað.
Gif he þonne gyt þurhwunað, ymbe feower monðas sy him eft þes yleca regol geræd and þæt andgyt gewissod.
Gif þonne be his agenum dome behæt, þæt he eallu þing gehealdan wille and ealle þæs regoles beboda mid eaðmodnesse gefyllan, sy he underfangen on þære geferrædenne.

Wite he eac, þæt he mid þæs regoles bendum swa is getiged and gestaþelod, þæt he of ðam dæge of þam mynstre faran ne mot, ne his sweoran ascacan, ne ascyrian fram þam geoce þæs halgan regoles, ðonne he moste ær swa geceosan swa aweorpan, swaþer he wolde, under swa langsumre smeagunge.

Siðþan he underfangen sy and innan ciricean gebroht, behate he beforan ealre gefærrædenne Gode and eallum his halgum, þæt he staþolfæst on mynstre gewunian wille and his þeawas ealle to Godes willan geweman and on hyrsumnesse þurhwunian.
Gif þænne ahwænne þis behat abrycð, wite he, þæt he bið geniþered and gehyned fram ælmihtigum drihtne, þe he bysemerað.
Be þam his gehate sette he fæstnunge mid gewrite to þæs abbodes naman and þæra halgena, þe hyra reliquie, þæt is hyra ban, on þære stowe restað.

Write he þa fæstnunge mid his agenre handa, gif he þonne writan ne cunne, bidde oþerne, þe writan cunne, þæt hine aspelige, and he sylf on þam gewrite rodetacn mearcige and hy swa fæstniende mid his agenum handum uppan þone altare alecge.

Sona swa he þæt gewrit uppan þone altare alecge, beginne þis fers and þus cweþe:Suscipe me, Domine, secundum eloquium tuum, et uiuam, et non confundas me ab expectatione mea, þæt is on ure geþeode: Drihten, onfoh min æfter þinum behate, and ic libbe, and ne gescend þu me on minre anbidunge.
Þæt ylece fers he sceal þriwa cweþan and eal geferræden þriwa mid þam ylecan ferse andswarian and þærto geþeodenGloria Patri.
Se sylfa nigecumena broðor, siðþan he gehalgod bið, gefealle ælces ænlipiges fet and þæs wilnige, þæt hi him fore gebidden; of þæm dæge sy he broðor geteald on þære geferrædenne.

Gif he hwylce æhta hæbbe, oðþe hi on ær þearfum gedæle, oðþe arweorðlice mid him sylfum þam mynstre betæce; he nan ðing him sylfum to syndrigum æhtum ne gehealde; eornestlice, of ðam dæge nah he forðon his agenes lichoman geweald, þe oþera æhta ne sceolde.
Hine man sona unscryde and þa reaf nime, þe he ær notode, and hine mid mynstres reafum gescryde.

Healde mon on hrægelhuse þa reaf, þe he him ofdyde, toðy, gif he ahwænne mid deofles costnunge beswicen bið, þæt on geþafunge gæþ, þæt he his gehat Gode awæge and þæt mynster forlæte, þæt na næfre ne geweorþe, sy benæmed þæs godcundan reafes and mid þam weoroldcundum, þe he ær forlet, gescryd and swa of mynstre adræfed.
Healde mon þeah æfre þæt gewrit his fæstnunge on þam mynstre.
BE RICCERA AND ÐEARFENA ANDFENGE.

Gif hwylc rice mon and æþelboren his bearn Gode on mynstre geoffrian wile, gif þæt cild þæs andgites næbbe, þæt he sylf mæge oðþe cunne hine sylfne, gefæstnian hine þa magas mid ofrunge, þæt is, bewinde þæs cildes hand and þæt gewrit his fæstnunge on þæs altares weofodsceate and hine swa Gode geoffrien mid offrunge hlafes and wines.

Behaten þa magas and mid aþe gefæstnian, þæt hi næfre syndrige æhta hyra mæge ne gesellan, ne þurh hy sylfe ne þurh nænne gespelian, ne hy næfre nænne incan ne secen, hu him to syndrigum æhtum gerymed sy.
Gif hy þonne hwæt syllan willan, sellan hi þæt þære haligan stowe to rihtum gemænscipe, him to ecum edleane; and him siþþan sy wegnestes getiðad, and swa mid wegneste ham cyrren, gif hi þæs wilnien.

Syn ealle þa æhta, þe þam cilde gebyrien, swa fordylegade and todælede, þæt him nan hyht beon ne þyrfe, þelæs þe he losige, gif he his hyht beset on syndrigum æhtum, þæt na ne geweorðe; we foroft onfundon, þæt mænig þurh þone hiht syndrigra æhta losode.
Do handswagelice be hyra bearnum, þa þe unrice synd and hæfenlease þearfan.
Gif hi nane æhta to sellenne næbben, offrigen hyra bearn anfealdlice on gewitnesse rihtgelyfedra manna.
BE <ABBODUM> AND OÐRUM GEÐUNGENUM ÐE MYNSTRES WILNIAÐ.
Gif hwylc mæssepreost wilnað, þæt hine mon to munuchade to mynstre underfo, ne sy him na ðe raþor getiþad, forþy þe he mæssepreost is.

Gif he þonne þurhwunað on þisse gewilnunge, ne sy nan ðing forlæten, þæt þe regol tæce on his fandunge, ac underfo he georne ælcne regoles þeaw and tæcinge; sy he æfter Cristes boce tæcincge þus geahsod: Freond, to hwy com þu?
Þæt is on andgite: com þu mid sibbe and mid soþre anbryrdnesse, þe mid ungeþwærnesse and licetunge?
Sy him geþafod, þæt he styde æfter þam abbode healde and þæt he mæssan singe, gif se abbod swa tæce; ne gedyrstlæce he na þa þenunge to beginnenne butan þæs abbodes hæse.
Sy he simle gearo to ælcere steore be regoles tæcincge, and swa micle eaðmodre, swa he furþor on hade is, bysnige he a ealle eaðmodnesse eallum þam, þe hine midwuniað.

Gif he for his hades arweorðnesse furðor forlæten sy, ne gedyrstlæce he on nanre gefadunge þurh þæs hades truan no furþar, þonne his gecyrrednes wæs; ac besceawige a þone steal his gecyrrednesse and hine be þam gemedemige, butan hine mon for ðam sacerdhade furðor forlæte.
Ða þe clerichades synd and munuchades wilniað, syn hy underfangenne on medemum stydum, swa þeah, þæt hy behat don be hyra staþelfæstnesse and be ealre þæs halgan regoles gymene.
BE ELÐEODEGUM MUNECUM HU HI MON UNDERFON SCEAL.

Se utancumena munuc, þe of uncuðum eardum cymð, gif he on cuman hiwe wunian wile and mid nanre oferflowednesse þæt mynster ne gedrefð, ac bið eaðhylde and þære stowe þeawum getricce, sy he onfangen and swa longe wunige, swa him sylfum licige.

Gif he gesceadelice mid eaðmodnesse and mid soþre lufe hwilcu þing on mynstere tæle oþþe tæce, underfo se abbod þæt mid eaðmodnesse and smeage on his geþance, þæt hine God þider asende, þæt seo stow þurh hine gegodod and geriht wære.
Gif he eft on ænigne timan hine sylfne to mynstres wununge gefæstnian wile, ne sy na his gewilnung onscunod, forþy þe mon meahte his lif tocnawan on þan fyrste, þe he on cuman hiwe on mynstre wunade.

Gif hine mon leahtorfulne ongit on þone timan his cumliðnesse, ne sceal he agan nane geþeode, naðer ne wið þæt mynster ne wið þa geferrædenne, ac him mon secge mid arweorðnesse, þæt he þanon gewite, þelæs þe he mid his yrmðe oþre geleahtrige.

Gif he þænne swa aredad bið on þære cumliðnesse, þæt he ne sy wyrðe þære scyrunge, þeah he na ne bidde, hine mon georne weme, þæt he wununge healde, toþi þæt oðre þurh his godan bysenunge gelærede syn and gebeterade, forþy þe on ælcere stowe is anum drihtne, þæm heofonlican cyninge, geþeowad and gehyrsumod.
Gif se abbod his geearnunge swylce ongyte, he hine mot be suman dæle furþor weorðian and him innor tæcan stede and setl.

Na þæt an be munecum anum is þis to healdenne, ac eac swylce be arwyrðum canonicum, þe to munuclife cumað, þæt hi þurh gode geearnunge furðor syn gemedemad, syn swæþer hy syn, þe sacerdhades swa clerichades, gif se abbod his lifes geearnunga swylce tocnæwð.

Warnige þeahhweþere se abbod, þæt he natohwon of nanum cuþum mynstre munuc ne underfo to wununge, butan hit his abbodes geþafung sy and him þæs gewrit sænde mid swutelunge, forðy hit is þus awriten: Ne do þu oþrum, þæt þu nelle, þæt þe sylfum gedon sy.
BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM AND HYRA ÐENUM.
Gif hwylc abbod mæssepreostes behofige, oðþe diacones, geceose he of his agenum geferum þe þæs hades wyrðe sy, and hine gehadian læte.

Syþþan he þonne gehadod sy, warnige hine georne wið modignesse and toþundenre upahefednesse, ne he nan þing furðor ne gedyrstlæce, þonne him from his abbode beboden sy; wite he eac, þæt he swa micle eaðmodra beon sceal on regoles underþeodnesse, swa miclum swa he furðor forlæten is.
Ne he þurh þone truwan his sacerdhades ofergumige þa hyrsumnesse and þa steore þæs halgan regoles, ac þurh þone had a swiþor and swiðor on God ælmihtigne þeo.

Healde he simle þone styde and þa endebyrdnesse his gecyrrednesse, butan þære þenunge anre þæs halgan weofodes, gif hit swa getimige, þæt se abbod and seo gecorenes þære geferræddenne hine for his lifes geearnunge weorðian wile and furðor gemedemian.
Wite he þeah, þæt he sy a underþeod þam halgan regole and þam prafoste, and ælc þing do and acume, þæs þe hy him to rihte tæcen.
Gif he ælcra þurh toþundennesse gedyrstlæcð, ne sy he sacerd geteald, ac Godes wiþercora.
Gif he þonne þurh myngunge gerihtlæcan nele, sy he on þæs bisceopes gewitnesse gestanden.
Gif he þonne gyt gebetan nelle, æt openum gyltum sy he of mynstre adræfed, þeahhwæþere gif his toþundennes to þam micel wæs, þæt he underþeod beon nolde, ne ðam halegum regole hyrsumian.
BE EALLES GEFERES ENDEBYRDNESSE.
Ælc endebyrdnes on mynstre sceal beon gehealden and gefadod be heora gecyrrednesse and be lifes geearnunge and be þæs abbodes gestaþelunge.

Se abbod ne geunstille, ne ne gedrefe þa heorde, þe him underþeod is, ne he nan þing ne misfadige, ne unrihtlice ne geendebyrde, swylce he freolice don mote þæt, þæt him licige; wite he, þæt he æt Godes dome gescead agyldan sceal and andsware ealra his doma and ealra his dæda.
Æfter þære endebyrdnesse, þe se abbod gestaþelað and þa gebroþra him betweoh healdað, gange ælc æfter oðrum to cosse, to husle and be þan on chore stande and sealmas and gehwylce þenunga beginne.
On nanum stowum ne sy endebyrdnes be nanre ylde gefadod, ne seo ylde þa geogoðe ne forþringe, forði Samuel and Daniel cildgeonge forealdædum mæssepreostum demdon.

Forði þonne, butan þam anum, þe for heora leahtrum of hyra endebyrdnesse utor ascofene synd, oðþe for haliges lifes geearnunge innor genumene, ælc oþer, oferylde and geogeþe, healde his endebyrdnesse, swa swa he gecyrde, swylce ic þus cweþe: Gif twegen on anum dæge to Gode gecyrrað, sy se furðor on ælcre endebyrdnesse, þe on þære forman tide þæs dæges, þonne se on þære oðre tide cymð, sy he swylcre ylde oðþe geþincðe, swylce he sy.
Ða gingran forði arweorðian hyra yldran, and þa yldran lufian hyra gingran.
Ne gedyrstlæce hyra nan, þæt he oþerne agenum naman synderlice genemne, ac þa yldran hyra gingran broþor nemnen, and þa gingran hyra yldran nonnos nemnen, þæt is: leof and arwesa.
Se abbod forþi, þe he Godes gespelia is, sy hlaford gehaten and fæder, na for his agenum þingum, ac for Cristes arweorðnesse and for þæs lufe, þe he speleð.
He symle þencende sy and hine swylcne on godre drohtnunge gegearwige, þæt he sy wyrðe swa micles weorðscipes.
Swa hwar swa gebroðra hi gemetan, a se gingra bletsunge bidde fram þam yldran.

Gif se yldra swa forðgange, þær se gingra sit, arise se gingra mid eadmodnesse and þam yldran to setle ryme; ne gedyrstlæce se gingra, þæt he mid þam yldran sitte, butan he hine hate, þæt simle sy gehealden, þæt on haligum bocum awriten is, þæt is, þæt hi him betweoh arweorðnesse healdan and mid arweorðnesse hi gemeten.

Þa cild and seo geogoð mid steore and þeawfæstnesse hyra endebyrdnessum fylien, ge on cyricean ge on beodernne; syn hy a behealdene mid steore and mid mycelre heordrædenne, ægðer ge inne, ge ute, ge æghwær, oð þæt hy to andgyttolre yldo cumen and to fulfremedre gestæþþignesse.
BE ÐÆS ABBODES HADUNGE.
On abbodes hadunge a is þæt to besceawigenne mid miclum gesceade, þæt se sy to abbode geset, þe eal geferræden anmodum geþeahte and halwendum æfter Godes ege gecyst.

Gif geferræden þæne ræd on gemænum geþeahte misredað and feawa witena þæs geferes þa þearfe forgode wislicor tocnawað, stande þara ræd, þe mid Godes ege and wisdome þa þearfe geceosað, þeah heora feawa sy.
Ne þa oþre ongean þæt ne sacan.
Æfter his lifes geearnunge and æfter his wisdomes lare sy gecoren, se þe to abbodhade sceal, eac swylce þeah he latost to mynstre come and ytemest sy on endebyrdnesse þære gesomnunge.

Gif hit þonne swa getimað, þæt eal geferræden anmodum geþeahte þone to abbode gecyst, þe hyra leahtrum geþeafige and him on gewil gange, and þæt þurh æfeste men and rihtgelyfedum cuþ bið þam biscope, þe seo halige stow on his bisceoprice is, forbeode he and alecge þa þwyrnesse hyra ungeþeahtes and mid fultume abboda and rihtgelyfedra manna, gesette þæne and gehadige to ðam dihte abbodhades, þe Godes hus wel fadige and on Godes riht gange and na on þweorra manna gewil.
Wite ægþer ge bisceop ge þa rihtgelyfedan, þæt hy micele mede æt Gode habbað, gif hy swa doð mid Godes ege, eac swylce micel wite, gif hi on geþafunge gað and for gymeleaste hit ne betað.

Ðænce se abbod, siðþan he gehadod sy, hu micele byrðene and hu hefigtyme he underfeng mid þam hade; wite he eac and smeage, hu he swyþor þam saulum framian mæge, þonne embe ricetere his anwealdes hogian.

Eornostlice hit gedafenað, þæt he wel gelæred sy mid godcundre lare and to þan snotor, þæt he cunne <haligo> spel reccan, ægþer ge of þære ealdan cyþnesse ge of þære niwan, and he sylf on geearnunge swylc sy, þæt man embe his agene halignesse sprecan mæge.
Sy he clæne and syueræte and mildheort, and sy a seo mildheortnesse wyldre þonne se rihta dom, þæt he on þæt ylce gemet Godes miltse begyte.
Hatige he þa leahtras and lufige þa gebroðra.

Sy he snotor and wel besceawod on his dædum and na oferswiþe ne þreage, þylæs þæt omige fæt mid ealle toberste, gif he hit mid ungemete scæfð; besceawige he a his agene tyddernesse and þurh þæt gebeorh sy, ne forbryte he na þæt tocnysede hreod.

Ne tæce we na mid swa geradum bysenum and gebeorhlicum larum, þæt he leahtras fyrðrige and weaxan læte, ac þæt he snotorlice and mid soþre lufe hy simle wanige, swa swa he ongyte, þæt hit framian mage his underþeoddum, swa swa we geo ær wiðforan cwædon.
Hycge he and gecneordlæce, þæt hine mon lufian mæge swiþor, þonne ondrædan.
Ne sy he drefre and ancgmod, ne sy he to swið and anwille, ne sy he æfestig and fæcne, forþy a bið ungestillod and restleas, þe mid þam unþeawum beled bið.
Sy he a foregleaw and wel besceawod on his gebodum; ægðer ge æfter godcundum þingum ge æfter woroldcundum tosceade he and gemetegie þa weorc ealle, þe he betæce.
Geþence he þa gesceadwisnesse Sancte Jacobes, þæs heahfæder, þe þus cwæþ: Gif ic mine heorda to swiðe on gange þrafige and swence, hy ealle anes dæges sweltað.

Nime him þas bysene and oþre swylce þæs soðan gesceades, þe is ealra mægena modor, and swa ealle þing gemetige, þæt sy þonne gyt on his gebodum, þæt þa strangan furðor wilnien and þa unstrangan ofersymede heora þeowdom ne forfleon, and huru þinga þæs anes hicge, þæt þises andweardan regoles gebodu on eallum þingum gehealdene syn and gefyllede.

Ðonne he wel þenað and hures drihtnes heorde cwiuerlice ealgað and to rihte manað, he onfehð ece lean fram drihtne and bliþe gehyrð, þæt se goda þeowa gehyrde, þe on rihtne timan hwæte gedælde his efenþeowum: Soþ is, þæt ic secge, ofer ealle his god he hine to ealdre for his gedreoge gesette.
BE MYNSTRES PRAFASTE.

Foroft hit getimað, þæt swyþe hefigtyme sacu and ungeþwærnessa on mynstre aspringað þurh þæs geendebyrdan profostes misfadunge; hyra sum mid þam awyrigdan gaste toþundennesse swa stiþe toblawenne, þæt him þincþ, þæt he sy oþer abbod, and þurh þæt he hine sylfne swa godne teleþ, bið swiðe sacful and micele ungeþwærnesse and mænigfealde saca on þære geferædenne wyrcð.
Ðis gelimpð swiþust on ðam stowum, þær se profost on gymenne bið geset fram þam ylcan biscopum oþþe abbodum, þe þone abbod gehadodun and on þam weorðmente settan.

Eaþe is to understandenne, of hwylcum antimbre þeos unþæslicu asprincð þisse miclam toþundennesse: him þincð on his geþance, þæt he þam abbode ne þyrfe hyran, forþy þe he hine to prafoste ne sette, ac þa sylfan him prafostscire betæhtan, þe þæne abbod to abbodhade gecoran.
Ðurh þis beoð awecte andan mid miclan æfeste, saca and tala and herincga, ungeþwærnessa and misfadunga.

Ðonne se abbod and se prafost ungerade beoð and him betwyx sacað, ægðer ge hyra agne saula þurh þas frecenesse losiað, and eac swylce þara, þe him underþeodde synd, þonne hy sume mid geficum wið þone anne þeodað and leasettað, sume wið þone oþerne.
Seo frecenes þyses yfeles belimpð to ðam swiðust, þe hi sylfe ealdras geworhton on swylcere fadunge and endebyrdnesse.
We forði foresceawiað and fremful taliað to gehealdsumnesse gemænre sibbe and soþre lufe, þæt eal mynstres fadung and endebyrdnesse on þæs abbodes dome and tæcinge simle stande.

Gif hit beon mæg, swylc notu þurh decanonas on mynstre sy gefadod and geendebyrd on þa wisan, þe se abbod dyht, þæt na nan ænlipig ne modige, ne hine na ne anhebbe, þonne mynstres notu manegum bið betæht.

Gif seo stow þæs neode hæbbe and seo geferræden þæs mid gesceade and mid eaðmodnesse þæs gewilnige, and hit þam abbode ræd þince, swa hwilcne swa se abbod geceose mid geþeahte þara broþra, þe God ondrædæð, sette þæne him to prauoste.

Se sylfa prauost do mid arweorðnesse eal, þæt him fram þam abbode getæht bið; ne do he nan þing ongean þæs abbodes willan and gefadunge, forþi swa miclan swa he furður on weorðmynte forlæten bið, swa miclan he sceal geornlicor Godes gerihta healdan and regules beboda.
Gif se prafast hlehterful onfunden bið, oþþe mid modignesse beswicen, oþþe þæs halgan regoles beboda forsyhð, sy mid wordum gestyred feower siðum.
Gif he gebetan nele þurh worda myngunge, sy him þreal geboden be regoles tæcinge.
Gif he þurh þreale nele gerihtan, he sy aworpen of þam prafostfolgoðe, and sy oþer on þa note geset, þe þæs wyrðe sy.
Siþþan he bescired bið, gif he on þære geferrædene gedefe ne bið and gehyrsum, hine man of mynstre mid ealle adræfe.

Geþænce þeahhwæþere se abbod, þæt he Gode ælmihtigum gescead agyldan sceal be eallum his dædum and domum, and warnige, þæt he þurh andan ne sy onweard þam profaste and swa his agene saule mid <forbærne>.
BE ÐÆS MYNSTRES GEATWEARDE.
To þæs mynstres geate sy geatweard geset, eald and wis, þe mid gesceade cunne andswara syllan and ærenda underfon; seo ripung his gestæþþignesse sy swylc, þæt hine ne worian, ne scriðan ne lyste.
Se sylfa geatweard sceal cytan habban wið þæt geat, þæt þa cuman, þe mynster geseceað, simle gearone hæbben and andwyrde þæra ærenda underfo.
Swa se cuma cnocige, oþþe se þearfa clypige, he sona cweþe Gode þanc, and hine georne bletsige and geþwærlice mid Godes ege mid ofeste andswarige mid þam wylme þære soðan lufe.
Se sylfa geatweard, gif he fultumes behofige, sy him gingra broðor betæht, þe him mid wicnige.

Gif hit beon mæg, swa sceal mynster beon gestaþelod, þæt ealle neadbehefe þing þær binnan wunien, þæt is wæterscype, mylen, wyrtun and gehwylce misenlice cræftas, þe synd gode to beganne, þæt nan neod ne sy munecum, utan to farenne, forþy þe seo utfaru nan þing ne framað hira saulum.
Þæs regul ic wille, þæt gesinlice sie geræd on geferrædenne, þæt hyra nan þurh nytennesse hine beladian ne mæge.
BE ÐAM ÐE UT OF MYNSTRE ON ÆRENDE FARAÐ.

Ða gebroðra, þe me for neode ut asend, bebeodan hy sylfe gemænum gebede, ægðer ge þæs abbodes ge ealles geferes, and þa hwile, þe hi on fare beoð, syn hy on gemynde, and æt ælces tidsanges ende eal geferræden him foregebidden.

Ðy forman dæge, þe hy ham cyrrað and to mynstre cumað, astreccen hi æt ælces tidsanges ende on hyra gebedhuse, and him ealle gemænlice foregebidden, þæt him nan þing ne derige, þæs þe hi agyltan on þam færelde, aþor oðþe þurh gesihþe, oþþe þurh gehlyste æniges yfeles þinges, oþþe þurh idele spræce.
Ne hyra nan ne dyrstlæce, þæt he oðrum recce, oðþe mid wordum gecyðe, hwæt he butan mynstre geseah, oðþe gehyrde; hit is micel mægena tostencennes, gif hit hwa deð.
Gif hit hwa gedyrstlæce, sy he gewyld mid rihtlicre steore.
BE UNACUMENLICRA ÐINGA GEBODE.
Gif hwylcum breþer færlice hwæt hefelices and unacumenlices beboden sy, underfo he þa geboda his tæcendes mid ealre geþwærnesse and mid micelre eaðmodnesse.

Gif he þonne eallunga ongyt, þæt þæs gebodes micelnes on þære hyrsumnesse his mihta oferstihð, þæt he eft mid geþylde on gedafenre tide his mægenleaste his ealdre gecyþe, he no þeah na wiðstande, ne mid modignesse ne wiðcweþe.
Gif þæs ealdres cwide þurhwunað and his gebod aheardað, wite se gingra mid gewisse, þæt hit him eal framað, and þurh Godes truwan mid soþre lufe þa hyrsumnesse beginne, þeah hine hwon onhagige.
BE ÐAM ÐÆT NAN OÐERNE ON MYNSTRE NE BEWERIGE.
Miclan is to warnienne, þæt nan broðor ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he oþerne oþþe mid wordum bewerige, oðþe mid ænigum anginne geealgige, þeah him word gemæne sy.
Ne sy þis on nanum gemete gedyrstlæht fram munuchades mannum, forði þanun mæg aspringan seo mæste sacu and se mæsta swice ealra ungeþwærnessa.
Gif hwa þis ofergyme þurh ænige gedyrstnesse, sy he ealra teartlicost geþread.
BE ÐAM ÐE NAN OÐRUM DYNT NE GEBEODE.
Sy forboden on mynstre ælcere gedyrstignesse intinga.
We geendebyrdaþ and gesettað, þæt nanum ne sy alyfed, þæt he ænigne broðra ne amansumige, ne mid swingele þreage, butan þam anum, þe se abbod þæs anweald sealde and leafe, þæt hi swa don moston.
Ða synfullan syn eawunge geþreade beforan ealre geferræddenne, þæt þara oþra gehwylc þurh þæt geegesod sy.
Cildgeongum mannum eal geferræden unþeawas styre, and hyra mycele gymene hæbben oð þæt fifteoþe ger hyra ylde; þæt þær sy gedon mid eallum gemete and mid eallum gesceade.
Gif hwylc hyra þurh gedyrstignesse on maran ylde betæcþ and þreale gebyt, butan þæs abbodes hæse, þe underlicge rihtlicre steore.
Syn eac handswagelice geþreade, þa ðe on þam sylfum cildum mid ungesceade gehatheortað, forþy hit þus awriten is: ðæt þu nelle, þæt þe sylfun gedon sy, ne do þu þæt oþrum.
BE ÐAM ÐÆT ÆLC OÐRUM HYRSUMIGE.

Hyrsumnesse god and duguð þæt is a ðam abbode to gegearwienne and mid mycelre eaðmodnesse to gebeodenne, na him anum, ac eac swylce ælc broðor oþrum estelice hyrsumige; witon hi eac, þæt þurh hyrsumnesse him bið weg gerymed to Gode.

Hæbbe se abbod anweald on eallum his hæsum and eac swa þa ealdras, þe fram him to ðam gesette synd, þæt hi oþrum beodum; we elles nanum oðrum ne geþafiað, þæt he gebod æfter hæse age; elles ælc oþrum hyrsumige mid soðre lufe and mid mycelre endebyrdnesse.
Gif hira hwylc geflitgeorn bið, sy him gestyred.

Gif hwylcum breþer for ænigum litlum gylte <byþ> <gecid> oþþe gestyred fram his abbode oþþe ænigum his yldrena, oþþe ongyt, þæt hira æniges mod wið hine astyred bið, þeah hit for gehwædum and eaþelicum þincge sie, he þærrihte hine astrecce butan ælcere elcunge and swa lange astreht æt his fotum licge, oþ þæt he his yldran mod gegladige and his bletsunge begite.
Gif he þis oferhigð and hit don nelle, hine man yfele mid swingele hæbbe; gif he on toþundennesse þurhwunað, hine man of þam mynstre mid ealle adræfe.
BE GODUM ÆFSTE, ÐE MUNECAS HABBAN SCEOLON.
Eal swa yfel biternesse anda and æfst <ascyreð> fram Gode and læt to helle, ealrihte swa god anda and anhering ascyreð fram synna leahtrum and læt to Gode and to ecum life.

Forþi þenne munecas þæne æran andan awyrpende, þysene oþerne mid hatan wylme soðre lufe geornlice began; ælc hicge mid arweorðnesse and mid þæs uplican lifes gewilnunge, hu he oþerne on halgum þeowdome forþeon mæge.
Hi mid geþylde him betweoh betende forberen þa untrumnessa hira lichamena and þa tyddernessa hira þeawa; ælc oþrum to geflites, hu he swyðust mæge, hyrsumige.
Hira nan ne filige his ahnum dome on þam þingum, þe he him sylfum nytwyrðe talige and behefe, ac þam swiðust, þe oðrum furður <framiam> mæge, þonne him sylfum.

Dælen him betweoh mid soðre lufe þa sibbe hira broþorrædene, ondræden a hira drihten, and hira abbod lufian mid anfealdre lufe and mid eaðmodre; hi nan þing him inmedre ne læten, ne besorhre, þonne hira drihten, þe us ealle gemænelice to ecum life gelæde.
BE ÐAM ÐÆT ÆLC RIHTWISNESSE GYMEN ON ÐISUM REGULE NIS GESET.
Ðisne regul, þæt is lifes rihtunge, we awriton toþy, þæt we hine on mynstre healden and æt sume cyrre geswutulian, þæt we angin godre drohtunge and godra þeawa arwyrðnesse þurh hine hæbben.
Se þe fulfremednesse haligre drohtnunge habban wile, þæt þa synd gesette to lifes bysene halegra fædera lara, þara gemen and gehealdsumnes gelæt mannan to fulþungenre fulfremednesse.
La, hwylc tramet is, oþþe hwylc spræc þæs godcundan lareoudomes, aþer oðþe þære ealdan cyðnesse oþþe þære niwan, þæt ne sy seo rihteste bysen uran menniscan lifes?
Oþþe hwylc boc is þara halgan fædera and rihtgelyfedra, þæt þæt ne clypige and swege, þæt we mid rihtum færelde cuman scylan to urum scyppende?

Eac swylce þara haligra fædera and þa gesettan lif hira drohtnunge and se regul ures halgan fæder Basilii, hwæt is hit elles butan getimbrunga and tol haligra manna and þara muneca, þe wel and rihte libbað and gehyrsume synd?
To sceame and to ablysunge hi sint us, þe asolcene synd and yfele and gymeleaslice mid unrihte libbað.

Swa hwylc swa onettende efst to þam heofonlican eþle, gefreme ærest þurh Godes fultum and mid Gode geenda þisne læstan regul, þe her awriten is, to anginne godre drohtnunge, and swa æt nyhstan Gode fultumiendum, þu cymst to þam marum geþincþum lare and mægna þara halgena, þe we bufan gemundum, þæt a geweorðe ece lif to edleane and midwununcg mid Gode eallum þam, þe þissum regule filigeað.
